devices.name: Amazon Firestick 4K
devices.guide: enable 'Apps from Unknown Sources' in settings, then use Downloader app code to install.

devices.name: Samsung Smart TV
devices.guide: search directly in the Samsung Tizen App Store. No external box needed.
devices.pros: Great 4K upscaling and stable Tizen OS.

devices.name: LG WebOS TV
devices.guide: download from LG Content Store. Avoid using the browser for streaming.
devices.pros: Magic Remote makes navigation very easy.

devices.name: Apple TV 4K
devices.guide: install directly from the App Store. One of the smoothest experiences.

devices.name: Android TV Box
devices.guide: install TiviMate via Google Play or sideload the APK.
devices.pros: The most customizable experience with TiviMate.

devices.name: iPhone & iPad

devices.pros: Watch your favorite shows on the go.

devices.name: Windows PC

devices.pros: No installation required if you have VLC.
